name: where-am-i
description: Identify your current working folder in status bar

configuration.title: Project Name In StatusBar extension configuration

where-am-i.source.description: Defines way of getting project name

where-am-i.align.description: Defines The alignment of the label, requires restart of vscode

where-am-i.alignPriority.description: Defines priority of the label. Higher values mean the label should be shown more to the left, requires restart of vscode

where-am-i.textStyle.description: Defines project name text style inside template

where-am-i.template.description: Defines template of project name placeholder, you can use octicons to decorate your view
